name: Rails Devise
description: Starter application generated by Rails Composer

scripts.postdeploy: bundle exec rake db:migrate; bundle exec rake db:seed

GMAIL_USERNAME.description: Your Gmail address for sending mail.

GMAIL_PASSWORD.description: Your Gmail password for sending mail.

ADMIN_EMAIL.description: The administrator's email address for signing in.

ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: The administrator's password for signing in.

DOMAIN_NAME.description: Required for sending mail. Give an app name or use a custom domain.
